features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Email/password authentication with signup, login, logout, forgot password, and reset password flows using Better-Auth

features.name: Subscription Management
features.description: Three-tier subscription system (Free, Monthly, Annual) with Stripe payment integration and usage tracking

features.name: Quick Estimate Builder
features.description: Real-time estimate calculator with equipment cost, materials cost, labor hours, labor rate, and discount percentage inputs

features.name: Saved Estimates CRUD
features.description: Create, read, update, delete full estimates with client info, line items, and discount

features.name: PDF Export
features.description: Generate and download professional PDF estimates with company branding (paid tiers) or watermark (free tier)

features.name: Copy to Clipboard
features.description: Copy formatted estimate text to clipboard for sharing

features.name: Template Save/Load
features.description: Save estimate configurations as templates and load them later (paid users only)

features.name: Usage Tracking
features.description: Track monthly estimate usage for free tier users with 3 estimates/month limit

features.name: Settings & Company Branding
features.description: User settings page with company name and logo upload for PDF branding

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features, pricing, and testimonials

features.name: Pricing Page
features.description: Dedicated pricing page with tier comparison and Stripe payment links

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main user dashboard with tabs for Quick Estimate and Saved Estimates

features.name: Stripe Webhook Handler
features.description: Handle Stripe webhook events for subscription activation and management

features.name: Email Service
features.description: Send transactional emails for password reset, welcome, and subscription confirmation using Resend
